summary: August 30 is the 242nd day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Squadron Leader Roger Joyce Bushell RAF  was an Auxiliary Air Force pilot who organised and led an escape from Stalag Luft III, a German prisoner of war camp. He was a victim of the Stalag Luft III murders. The escape was used as the basis for the film The Great Escape. The character played by Richard Attenborough, Roger Bartlett, is modelled on Roger Bushell.
title: Roger Bushell
